markdownRemark.html:
Hi, I'm Arpit. I am an interdisciplinary engineer and designer based in New York City. 🗽 I'm a Cornell University alum and a graduate of the Master of Engineering in Computer Science program at Cornell Tech. I've worked on building products and leading teams in energetic, creative, and technical environments. I recently founded my own company, Crater.


I've been teaching myself web development since 2008. I built this website to practice my craft, playtest ideas, and learn from any mistakes I might make along the way. Please share your thoughts with me, or see what's under the hood.
